data.name: Happy’s Humble Burger Farm: Score (OST)
data.detailed_description: The Happy’s Humble Burger Farm (OST) is a blend of many music genres, instruments and production techniques that ultimately results in Horror Prog. The synths are complemented by orchestras, which are supplemented by guitars and bass, all performed by Jon Reilly, aka Jon of the Shred. The main theme features vocals from the legendary Jason Paige!
